review: I had met with an accident on 6th March, 2021 near Sion Circle, Mumbai, and injured my left leg. I went for an x-ray at Lion Tarachand Bapa Hospital, Sion and the injury was diagnosed as fracture. I have been under Dr. Om Patil's treatment since then and have found him to be an expert and quite knowledgeable in the orthopaedic field. He diagnosed my injury correctly and has treated me well. It's been over 2 months and my fracture has healed completely. I am able to walk without any support or difficulty and am on the road to a complete recovery thanks to Dr. Om Patil.

The treatment done by Dr. Om Patil was fantastic.My dad was detected with high diabities and one of the leg fingers turned black. Dr. Patil helped in treating my dad right from the surgery till the follow ups so that the diabities is in check. My dad is healthy and doing fine now. Thank you so much for all the help Dr. üòä

Dr. Om Prakash effectively explained and communicated well, and I did trust his explanations. He is really friendly, and the treatment was really effective! He answered all my questions and doubts, I had many! and explained it in detail. **** *******

Dr. Om Patil is exceedingly professional and tremendously dedicated to his work. Two qualities which separated him from the other squad members were, he always believed in ‚ÄúDot the ‚ÄòI‚Äôs and cross the ‚ÄòT‚Äôs‚Äù and his ideas always had legs. I was suffering for Low back pain from last 4 years. I was very well-off to have him as Doc to treat my low back pain which steered an upright groundwork to my Pain releif without any surgery.
simply superb** *********** I had l4-l4 disc... he suggest me root block.. and I am fit now.. highly recommended

Patient while taking to patient 
Proper advice 
Provides sufficient time with discussion of patient 
Talk so well as per patients age n make understand about everything
i have been getting treatment from dr om for over a year now.he is an amazing dr.highly recommend him.
Dr. Om checked my mother's left knee and assessed it...he explained all do's and don't in very simple way...I will highly recommend him....

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Physiotherapy for Sports Injury Rehabilitation,Knee Pain Treatment,Joint and Muscle Problems,
review:
Dr is very friendly, was able to diagnosed my root cause of sport injury the treatment worked for me and the medicine he prescribed did the rest of the work
Accurate diagnosis and treatment given to me helped me to heal my injury faster and increased my performance.

**** ***** ******* ** ****** had great experience with Dr Om Patil. My Mommy suffering spine problem then I come to Lions Tarachand Bapa Hospital & Research centre at sion. I had meet Dr Om Patil along with my mom. In his first consultation diagnosed the problem and said no surgery at present. He advice some life style changes physiotherapy and regular medicine tablet and my mom recover from back pain problem in just 4 weeks. He his very friendly and polite and genius thanks to Dr Om Patil.
